name: Chaos On Pleasant Street
description:
Important: The WebGL build works but isn't optimized, play the executable for the full experience!

In the quiet town of Brusselsburg, the police station phones were ringing off the hook. Reports had been coming in all night long, there was Chaos on Pleasant Street.

You have one night to cause as much chaos as you can before the sun comes up! Destroying objects causes you to grow, but beware of the lights, as they will reduce your power.

Created in one week for Brackey's Game Jame 2021.2

Programming: James Landolf

Graphics: Harley Kuklinski

Music: Quetzatl

Consulting: Arjuna Lyons

Special Thanks: mickeleanjelo, raioboss3d, ArtLeaving for 3D assets
